reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa4.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com/'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Pub SEO' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub SEO' to appear in the list.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Structure' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Content types' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Post dialog'.
Click the 'XML sitemap' link.
Select 'Included' from the 'Inclusion' drop down list.
Click the 'Save content type' link.
Verify success message of 'The content type Post has been updated.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '1904127d394248f' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 1904127d394248f has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '5f87c9476733484' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Assert the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 5f87c9476733484 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Status report dialog'.
Verify success message of 'Cron ran successfully.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Search and metadata' menu link.
Mouse over the 'XML sitemap' menu link.
Click the 'Rebuild links' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Are you sure you want to rebuild the XML sitemap? dialog'.
Click the 'Rebuild Sitemap' button.
Switch to frame titled 'Rebuilding Sitemap'.
Wait for the frame titled 'Rebuilding Sitemap' to close.
Switch to the active frame titled 'XML sitemap dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The sitemap links were rebuilt.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Search and metadata' menu link.
Click the 'XML sitemap' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'XML sitemap dialog'.
Click the 'XMLSitemap Link' with text ''.
Verify the text '5f87c9476733484' is present on the page.
Verify the text '1904127d394248f' is NOT present on the page.
